verses.verse: When <S%G5613><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Knew <S%G1097><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Heard <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> More <S%G4119><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> Makes <S%G4160><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Baptizes <S%G907><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> John <S%G2491><s%>
[Although Indeed <S%G2544><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Was Not Baptizing <S%G907><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples, <S%G846><s%>
He Left <S%G863><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judea; <S%G2449><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Went Away <S%G565><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>
<S%G1163><s%> And It Was Necessary For <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Pass <S%G1330><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Samaria. <S%G4540><s%>

He Comes <S%G2064><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> A City <S%G4172><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Samaria <S%G4540><s%> Called <S%G3004><s%> Sychar, <S%G4965><s%> Near <S%G4139><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Land <S%G5564><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> Jacob <S%G2384><s%> To Joseph <S%G2501><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> His Son. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2258><s%> Now Was <S%G1161><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Fountain <S%G4077><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2384><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jacob's; <S%G3767><s%> Jesus Therefore, <S%G2424><s%> Being Wearied <S%G2872><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Journey, <S%G3597><s%> Sat <S%G2516><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fountain. <S%G4077><s%> The Hour <S%G5610><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> About The <S%G5616><s%> Sixth. <S%G1623><s%>

Comes <S%G2064><s%> A Woman <S%G1135><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Samaria <S%G4540><s%> To Draw <S%G501><s%> Water. <S%G5204><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Her <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> To Drink; <S%G4095><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3101><s%> For His Disciples <S%G846><s%> Had Gone Away <S%G565><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Provisions <S%G5160><s%> They Might Buy. <S%G59><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Woman <S%G1135><s%> <S%G3588><s%>, Samaritan, <S%G4542><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> A Jew <S%G2453><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> ' From <S%G3844><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> To Drink <S%G4095><s%> Dost Ask, <S%G154><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> A Woman <S%G1135><s%> Samaritan? <S%G4542><s%> <S%G3756><s%> For No <S%G1063><s%> Have Intercourse <S%G4798><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> With Samaritans. <S%G4541><s%>

Answered <S%G611><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Her, <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Thou Hadst Known <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gift <S%G1431><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%>, To Thee, <S%G4671><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%>, To Drink, <S%G4095><s%> <S%G4771><s%> Thou <S%G302><s%> Wouldest Have Asked <S%G154><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1325><s%> He Would Have Given <S%G302><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> Water <S%G5204><s%> Living. <S%G2198><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Woman, <S%G1135><s%> Sir, <S%G2962><s%> Nothing <S%G3777><s%> To Draw With <S%G502><s%> Thou Hast, <S%G2192><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Well <S%G5421><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Deep; <S%G901><s%> Whence <S%G4159><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Hast Thou <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Water <S%G5204><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Living. <S%G2198><s%>

Answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Her, <S%G846><s%> Everyone <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Drinks <S%G4095><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5204><s%> This Water <S%G5127><s%> Will Thirst <S%G1372><s%> Again; <S%G3825><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> ' <S%G1161><s%> But Whoever <S%G302><s%> May Drink <S%G4095><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Water <S%G5204><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Will Give 1325 V-FAI-1S Him 846 P-DSM 3756 PRT-N In No Wise 3361 PRT-N Shall Thirst 1372 V-AAS-3S For 1519 PREP 3588 T-ASM Ever, 165 N-ASM But 235 CONJ The 3588 T-NSN Water 5204 N-NSN Which 3739 R-ASN I Will Give 1325 V-FAI-1S To Him 846 P-DSM Shall Become 1096 V-FDI-3S In 1722 PREP Him 846 P-DSM A Fountain 4077 N-NSF Of Water 5204 N-GSN Springing Up 242 V-PNP-GSN Into 1519 PREP Life 2222 N-ASF Eternal. 166 A-ASF

Says <S%G3004><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Woman, <S%G1135><s%> Sir, <S%G2962><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Water, <S%G5204><s%> <S%G2443><s%> That <S%G3361><s%> I May Not Thirst <S%G1372><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> Here <S%G1759><s%> To Draw. <S%G501><s%>

Answered <S%G611><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Woman <S%G1135><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Have Not <S%G2192><s%> A Husband. <S%G435><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Her <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> <S%G2036><s%> Didst Thou Say, <S%G3754><s%> A Husband <S%G435><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Have Not; <S%G2192><s%>

Five <S%G4002><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Husbands <S%G435><s%> Thou Hast Had, <S%G2192><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> He Whom <S%G3739><s%> Thou Hast <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not <S%G2076><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> Husband : <S%G435><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Truly <S%G227><s%> Thou Hast Spoken. <S%G2046><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Woman, <S%G1135><s%> Sir, <S%G2962><s%> I Perceive <S%G2334><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> A Prophet <S%G4396><s%> Art <S%G1488><s%> Thou. <S%G4771><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Our Fathers <S%G2257><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mountain <S%G3735><s%> Worshipped, <S%G4352><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Say <S%G3004><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> It Is Necessary <S%G1163><s%> To Worship. <S%G4352><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Her <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Woman, <S%G1135><s%> Believe <S%G4100><s%> Me, <S%G3427><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Is Coming <S%G2064><s%> An Hour <S%G5610><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> Neither <S%G3777><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3735><s%> This Mountain <S%G5129><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> Shall Ye Worship <S%G4352><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father. <S%G3962><s%>

Ye <S%G5210><s%> Worship <S%G4352><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Know Not : <S%G1492><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Worship <S%G4352><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> We Know; <S%G1492><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Salvation <S%G4991><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> Is Coming <S%G2064><s%> An Hour <S%G5610><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> True <S%G228><s%> Worshippers <S%G4353><s%> Will Worship <S%G4352><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Truth; <S%G225><s%> <S%G2532><s%> For Also <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Such <S%G5108><s%> Seeks <S%G2212><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Worship <S%G4352><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

A Spirit <S%G4151><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God Is, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They That <S%G3588><s%> Worship <S%G4352><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> Must <S%G1163><s%> Worship. <S%G4352><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Woman, <S%G1135><s%> I Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Messiah <S%G3323><s%> Is Coming, <S%G2064><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Is Called <S%G3004><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> He Will Tell <S%G312><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> All Things. <S%G3956><s%>
Says <S%G3004><s%> To Her <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Am He, 1510 V-PXI-1S Who 3588 T-NSM Am Speaking 2980 V-PAP-NSM To Thee. 4671 P-2DS

And <S%G2532><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wondered <S%G2296><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> A Woman <S%G1135><s%> He Was Speaking; <S%G2980><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> However <S%G3305><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Seekest Thou? <S%G2212><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Speakest Thou <S%G2980><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Her? <S%G846><s%>

Left <S%G863><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5201><s%> Her Waterpot <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Woman <S%G1135><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Went Away <S%G565><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%>

Come, <S%G1205><s%> See <S%G1492><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Told <S%G2036><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> I Did : <S%G4160><s%> Perchance <S%G3385><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ! <S%G5547><s%>
They Went Forth <S%G1831><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> Unto <S%G4314><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1722><s%> But In <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Meantime <S%G3342><s%> Were Asking <S%G2065><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> Eat. <S%G5315><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Meat 1035 N-ASF Have 2192 V-PAI-1S To Eat 5315 V-2AAN Which 3739 R-ASF Ye 5210 P-2NP 3756 PRT-N Know Not. 1492 V-RAI-2P

Said <S%G3004><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G240><s%> One Another, <S%G3361><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Did Bring <S%G5342><s%> Him Anything <S%G846><s%> To Eat? <S%G5315><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> My <S%G1699><s%> Meat <S%G1033><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> I Should Do <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Will <S%G2307><s%> Of Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Sent <S%G3992><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Should Finish <S%G5048><s%> His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Work. <S%G2041><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Say, <S%G3004><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Yet <S%G2089><s%> Four Months <S%G5072><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Harvest <S%G2326><s%> Comes? <S%G2064><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Lift Up <S%G1869><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3788><s%> Your Eyes <S%G5216><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> See <S%G2300><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fields, <S%G5561><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> White <S%G3022><s%> They Are <S%G1526><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Harvest <S%G2326><s%> Already. <S%G2235><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Reaps <S%G2325><s%> A Reward <S%G3408><s%> Receives, <S%G2983><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gathers <S%G4863><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> Unto <S%G1519><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> Eternal, <S%G166><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Sows <S%G4687><s%> Together <S%G3674><s%> May Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Reaps. <S%G2325><s%>

I 1473 P-1NS Sent 649 V-AAI-1S You 5209 P-2AP To Reap 2325 V-PAN On Which 3739 R-ASN Not 3756 PRT-N Ye 5210 P-2NP Have Laboured; 2872 V-RAI-2P Others 243 A-NPM Have Laboured, 2872 V-RAI-3P And 2532 CONJ Ye 5210 P-2NP Into 1519 PREP 3588 T-ASM 2873 N-ASM Their Labour 846 P-GPM Have Entered. 1525 V-2RAI-2P

<S%G1537><s%> But Out Of <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4172><s%> That City <S%G1565><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Believed <S%G4100><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%>, Samaritans, <S%G4541><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Woman <S%G1135><s%> <S%G3140><s%> Testifying, <S%G3754><s%> He Told <S%G2036><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> I Did. <S%G4160><s%>

When <S%G5613><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Samaritans, <S%G4541><s%> They Asked <S%G2065><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Abide <S%G3306><s%> ' With <S%G3844><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Abode <S%G3306><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Days. <S%G2250><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4183><s%> Many More <S%G4119><s%> Believed <S%G4100><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> His Word; <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And To The <S%G5037><s%> Woman <S%G1135><s%> <S%G3004><s%> They Said, <S%G3754><s%> No Longer <S%G3765><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Thy <S%G4674><s%> Saying <S%G2981><s%> We Believe, <S%G4100><s%> <S%G846><s%> For Ourselves <S%G1063><s%> Have Heard, <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> We Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Truly <S%G230><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> World, <S%G2889><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

<S%G3326><s%> But After <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> He Went Forth <S%G1831><s%> Thence, <S%G1564><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Went Away <S%G565><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee; <S%G1056><s%>
